# init(littleEndian:)

**Initializer**

Creates an integer from its little-endian representation, changing the byte order if necessary.

## Declaration

```swift
init(littleEndian value: Self)
```

## Parameters

- **value**: A value to use as the little-endian representation of the new integer.

## Working with Byte Order

- **byteSwapped**: A representation of this integer with the byte order swapped.
- **littleEndian**: The little-endian representation of this integer.
- **bigEndian**: The big-endian representation of this integer.
- **init(bigEndian:)**: Creates an integer from its big-endian representation, changing the byte order if necessary.
